useCase.name: Create Dataset Instance
useCase.description: User requests to create a new dataset instance

preconditions.precondition: DataScientist is authenticated and has access to Dataset Management System

successEndConditions.condition: New dataset instance is successfully created and displayed to the user

failureEndConditions.condition: Dataset type does not exist or user lacks permissions

useCase.trigger: User requests to create a dataset instance

mainSequence.step: DataScientist requests to create dataset instance
UI parses request parameters (Select existing dataset type, Define instance properties)
Dataset Management System verifies permissions and dataset type existence
Dataset Management System creates new dataset instance with specified properties
Dataset Management System displays success message with instance details
UI shows confirmation/error message to DataScientist
